kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
Really looking forward to seeing some good use cases for the media upload direct from mobile phones. It will be good to see AIRA handle [optimising of image assets](https://docs.kentico.com/business-users/content-hub#optimize-image-assets) so editors don't need to worry about performance, and in combination with [image variants](https://docs.kentico.com/business-users/content-hub#image-variants) they'll be ready to use on **all** channels immediately.
Is the "early adopter" sign up form to get AIRA enabled on the project you are working on?
Also I'm wondering about the chat history of user conversations with the AI, is the conversation history stored on the device, or in the XbyK instance, elsewhere?
